Docs.summary: Represents a reference to an event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks CodeEventReferenceExpression can be used to represent a reference to an event.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A> property specifies the object that contains the event. The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.EventName%2A> property specifies the name of the event.
